Full Description: DocSpot was founded in June 2009 with a mission of helping people make better healthcare decisions. Officially launched in August 2010, DocSpot.com empowers people to find providers that are right for their individual needs by increasing the transparency and navigability of relevant information. Using an integrative approach, DocSpot pulls together data from over 600 publicly available sources into one unified interface. Sources include state medical boards, hospital and clinic physician directories, and reviews from around the web. The sources of the data on each provider's profile page are shown for the convenience of both the prospective patient and the provider. To keep the data fresh, DocSpot re-visits the sources on a regular basis. DocSpot believes that "right" care can mean very different things to each person and that doctors are as multidimensional as their patients.
